properties.Name: StatementOfChangesInEquity
properties.Description: The Statement of Changes in Equity is used to itemize the differences between the equity at the beginning of the accounting period and the equity at the end of the accounting period.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementId

Columns.Description: The period start date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Description: The period end date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Description: The balance at the beginning of the accounting period.

Columns.Name: ProfitLossPriorPeriod
Columns.Description: The amount of profit / loss for the accounting period.

Columns.Name: OtherComprehensiveIncomePriorPeriod
Columns.Description: The amount of comprehensive income for the accounting period.

Columns.Name: ComprehensiveIncomeTotalPriorPeriod
Columns.Description: The total comprehensive income for the accounting period.

Columns.Name: RecognitionOfShareBasedPaymentsPriorPeriod
Columns.Description: The amount of share-based payments for the accounting period.
